Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumor (GIST) Panel, NGS
Purpose: To identify genetic mutations in gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST) tissue using next-generation sequencing for clinical assessment.
Container: Appropriate tumor tissue container (not specifically defined in SOP)
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, Qubit fluorometer or spectrophotometer, fragment/bioanalyzer, Illumina or Ion Torrent NGS sequencer
